title: Unable to comment on boards - "You must be level ___"
body: I'm level 30, Plat V, 13-1 in ranked, I'm more than qualified to post a comment, yes?  Am I missing something?

replies.body:
Your Boards and Summoner profiles will sometimes be out of sync, however, a discussion post such as this, will often resolve the problem. I now see you at level 30, so you should have no further issues posting.

Let me know if you have any questions.
